comments:
When switching to or from the Debug perspective and when debugging hits a breakpoint or a step is taken the following error is generated accompanied with a popup dialog.  Selecting OK allows the debug session to continue, but the next step or exiting the debug perspective simply repeats the error.  This first began occuring with the 3.2M4 release and has been consistently apparent since.  I have not been able to find an existing bug report for this condition.  It occurs on both my machines.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui.workbench 4 2 2006-01-18 10:06:37.827
!MESSAGE Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-in: "org.eclipse.ui.workbench".
!STACK 0

do you have MyEclipse installed? This error is coming from a genuitec class.
Suggest that you file the bug with them.
